resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106137</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106137</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212179</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Solar System Animations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solarsystem Animationen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Animations de Système Solaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Animations Do Sistema Solar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Animazioni Del Sistema Solare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωτικότητες ηλιακών συστημάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Animaciones De la Sistema Solar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site features Flash animations that illustrate phases of the moon, distances between planets, total, partial, and annular eclipses, and solar system formation that includes an example of the impact that created the moon. These resources are suitable for use in lectures, labs, or other teaching activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Situationsmerkmale blinken Animationen, die
Phasen des Mondes, Abstände zwischen Planeten, die Gesamtmenge, 
teilweises und ringförmige Eklipsen veranschaulichen, und Solarsystem
Anordnung, die ein Beispiel der Auswirkung einschließt, die den Mond 
herstellte. Diese Betriebsmittel sind für Gebrauch in den 
Vorträgen, in den Labors oder in anderen unterrichtenden Aktivitäten
verwendbar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les dispositifs de ce site flashent les animations
qui illustrent des phases de la lune, des distances entre les 
planètes, le total, partiels, et des éclipses annulaires, et la 
formation de système solaire qui inclut un exemple de l'impact qui a 
créé la lune. Ces ressources conviennent pour l'usage dans les
conférences, les laboratoires, ou d'autres activités d'enseignement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As características deste local piscam os 
animations que ilustram fases da lua, distâncias entre planetas, 
total, parciais, e eclipses anulares, e a formação do sistema solar 
que inclui um exemplo do impacto que criou a lua. Estes recursos
são apropriados para o uso nos lectures, nos laboratórios, ou em 
outras atividades ensinando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caratteristiche di questo luogo espongono a flash 
animazioni che illustrano le fasi della luna, le distanze fra i 
pianeti, il totale, parziali ed eclipse anulari e formazione del 
sistema solare che include un esempio dell'effetto che ha creato la 
luna. Queste risorse sono adatte ad uso nelle conferenze, in 
laboratori, o in altre attività d'istruzione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή χαρακτηρίζει τις ζωτικότητες λάμψης 
που επεξηγούν τις φάσεις του φεγγαριού, αποστάσεων μεταξύ των 
πλανητών, συνολικών, μερικών, και δακτυλιοειδών εκλείψεων, και το
σχηματισμό ηλιακών συστημάτων που περιλαμβάνει ένα παράδειγμα 
του αντίκτυπου που δημιούργησε το φεγγάρι. Αυτά τα στοιχεία
συμπεριφοράς είναι κατάλληλα για τη χρήση στις διαλέξεις, τα 
εργαστήρια, ή άλλες δραστηριότητες διδασκαλίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las características de este sitio contellean las 
animaciones que ilustran las fases de la luna, las distancias entre 
los planetas, el total, parciales, y los eclipses anulares, y la 
formación de la Sistema Solar que incluye un ejemplo del impacto que 
creó la luna. Estos recursos son convenientes para el uso en 
conferencias, laboratorios, u otras actividades de enseñanza.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212179</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 1.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106137</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/solar-system-animations</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
